content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm interested in hearing your proposal for the rental price of the apartment. What is your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My offer is 700 Euros per month. I believe that this is a fair price considering the size of the apartment and its location. What is your counteroffer?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Maria. While I appreciate your proposal, I believe that a rental price of 700 Euros per month is quite low for an apartment of this size and location in Mannheim. I'm willing to consider higher offers, but I'm afraid that 700 Euros is not enough to cover my costs and maximize my gains as a landlord. May I suggest a counteroffer of 900 Euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: That's a fair price. I can accept it. I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month. Thank you.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: You're welcome, Maria. I'm glad that we could come to an agreement on the rental price. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I look forward to having you as a tenant in the apartment. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
